headline.main: RUSSIA REPORTED BOLSTERING LINE5; Said to Be Increasing Forces in Ukraine, Poland and Estonia Against Reich AXIS ANNOYANCE IS SEEN Moscow Is Said to Have Told Nazis Bombers in the South Will 'Spray Wheat Crops'

abstract: USSR-German relations reptd cooling; USSR increases forces in Ukraine, Poland and Estonia
